data.name: Sail Single Player
data.description:
UNLEASH your Inner Pirate in SAIL the Open World VR Pirate game!!!

Earn your Pirate reputation through EPIC voyages where you'll test yourself by collecting as much treasure as possible and bringing it back safely to your Pirate hideout.

BUT BE WARNED . . .

You're not the only Pirate seeking fortune on the seas.

Fight off Pirate enemies on land with your Pirate weapon of choice

- OR -

 Battle them on the seas using your ship's cannons and VOICE COMMANDS!

Put your plunder to good use and use your riches to equip yourself with the best weapons and ships a Pirate could ask for.

With an Open World filled with Treasure, Mysterious Islands and limitless possibilities there's only one question to ask . . .

Arrrrgh you ready to set SAIL ???

PLEASE NOTE: This is game is Early Access so it is not perfect and still a work in progress. We appreciate any and all feedback so leave it in a review or JOIN THE DISCORD and let us know there!

THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING SAIL!!!

changelog.change_log: Updated to have a link to the full version and added more signs in market directing players to buy full version
Fixed game crashing bugs and fixed shovel from scaling.  Added leaderboard and achievements.
Fixed shift raft and fixed player shop
Fixed enemy spawning and animation bugs
Fixed player drift, Sound setting issues and small bugs
Fixed Weapon Holster, Tweaked the Island Scenes to be cleaner
New Free Demo is close to being ready. We need your help to polish the free demo. Any bugs or problems, let us know

New Features:
- Tutorial
- Added ice wall to represent demo restrictions


Known Issues
- Boats clip through certain islands and npc ships
- Medium Enemy ship doesn't fire back
- Ship upgrades still not enabled

Report bugs on discord
Added Voice Commands, Ship upgrades will be up for a bit till the final free demo version is released. All weapons have been improved.
Enemy ships are back! They only collider with the raft and the player
Fixed returning to hideout bug and fixed range weapon bullets
This build should be more stable. No enemy ships and no upgrades yet. But game play should be more stable.
Bug fixes and updated build to maintain better frame rate

Sail is now using a voice recognition package called Recognissimo. Recognissimo is an internet free, real time, speech recognition plugin from the Unity Asset store.
Because an internet connection is not required the speech recognition relies on a saved speech library on the users device to perform the speech recognition which  requires the android permissions to record audio, read / write to external storage and access media location. The asset claims that the speech data stays 100% private and as a dev team we have not changed the asset in any way to compromise that privacy.
This asset & these permissions are critical to our game's success and as a dev team we are willing to make the necessary changes to ensure we are able to use this key feature in our game if needed.
